description:

GUNSUNDHEIT!!!

Welcome to Gunsundheit, a game about a person born with a automatically-aiming gun nose and no arms with which to control it! Your job is to help Gun Nose get from point A, to point B, without getting arrested for murder of cute critters!

FEATURES:

- Simple Two-Button Interface (Mouse click/touch screen, A/D, Left/Right arrow keys, 'Enter' on menu buttons)

- Mobile Friendly

- Should Work on All OSs and Devices (some exceptions may occur)

- Colorblind Friendly? (unconfirmed, but screenshots look good on all settings of the colorblind simulator I use)

BUG FIXES

10/6/2021

Fix 3:

  • Changed end state script to call the correct high score variable rather than labeling your current score as the high score. Result: User will now know the actual value of their high scores each run. Previous versions remain up for download.

10/5/2021

Fix 2:

  • Fixed bug where button functionality wasn't fully working when buttons were clicked/tapped on but did work with keyboard controls. Result: Game is now actually playable on mobile, and it is no longer possible to cheese a win by holding "left" with the mouse/touchscreen. Previous two versions remain up for download.

Fix 1:

  • Changed calculation resulting in strange behaviors (meter freezing, not shooting).  Result: Game now feels more balanced due to calculation change. Broken version at launch will be left as downloadable.
  • Added threshold for sneeze value due to tween calculation not reaching full value sometimes. Result: Meter should no longer freeze when full.

Tools

  • Godot
  • Audacity
  • Paint.net
